title: Adding a Contact
body:
Adding a Contact¶

To add a new contact, you will need to have navigated to the add contact pop-up tab. If you are having trouble getting to this point, refer to Adding A New Contact
This option for adding a new contact should be used when you do not already have their details under another contact - as to not create a duplicate.
Note that all the fields are optional. Fill out what is known and/or is necessary.

  1. Click Add Contact

  2. Fill out the core properties: first name, last name, email, phone, mailing address, organization, job title, a photo birthday, and spouse.

  3. Click the properties below that are applicable to the contact and fill out the fields

  4. Click Lists and select the lists to which the contact will belong (this means when they want to connect with their contacts, this contact will be included in their list)

  5. Click Topics and select the topics to which the contact will belong

  6. Click Save
